subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Before the start of World Cup qualifying next week, the United States national team continued to struggle and was held to a scoreless tie by a determined Canadian squad on Sunday night.
snippet: Before the start of World Cup qualifying next week, the United States national team continued to struggle and was held to a scoreless tie by a determined Canadian squad on Sunday night.
